#summary Configuration of hardware interfaces with BeagleLAB

  * Dev board -> *RS232 ->GPIO*-> BeagleLAB as RS232 analyser
  * Dev board -> *SPI ->GPIO*-> BeagleLAB as SPI analyser
  * Dev board -> *I2C ->GPIO*-> BeagleLAB as I2C analyser
  * Dev board -> *Sample at 8Mhz ->GPIO*-> BeagleLAB as Waveform analyser
